Extension Description

This extension is designed to help you learn and memorize new, unfamiliar words! With its assistance, you can significantly accelerate the process of acquiring new vocabulary by utilizing visual memory. By highlighting all new words on any websites you visit, you'll constantly encounter them in context, which contributes to better memorization and understanding.

Why is this useful?

Highlighting words on websites allows you to consistently see and repeat new words in real-life situations. This enhances the memorization process and helps you better understand how words are used in different contexts. Continuous visual reminders speed up learning and make it more effective. You transform ordinary web browsing into an active language learning experience.

Key Features:

- Built-in Browser Dictionary: Add new words from any page without interrupting your content viewing.
- Highlighting Added Words: All words you've added to your dictionary will be automatically highlighted on the websites you visit.
- Personalized Learning: Customize the level of word knowledge, highlight color, translation or meaning, and tags for categorization.

How to Add a Word to Your Dictionary:

1. Double-click on the word you want to add.
2. In the pop-up menu, select the necessary parameters:
   - Level of word knowledge
   - Highlight color
   - Translation or meaning
   - Tag related to the word
3. The word will be added to your dictionary, which you can open by clicking on the extension icon in the extensions menu.
4. Double-clicking on a word already added will bring up the edit menu, where you can modify its parameters.

Conclusion

This extension turns your time on the internet into an effective language learning tool. Constant interaction with new words in their natural environment expands your vocabulary and improves overall language comprehension. Make the learning process a part of your everyday life!
